title: ESG exclusive 'club' puts pressure on agriculture - AgUpdate
summary: The article discusses the impact of ESG on the agriculture sector and how it relates to sustainability, environmental concerns, and regulatory pressures.

title: Koch Engineered Solutions and Percepto Join Forces To Bring - CSRwire.com
summary: Koch Engineered Solutions and Percepto have partnered to bring AI and autonomous drone technology to help monitor and reduce emissions for industrial customers. The collaboration aims to offer cutting-edge solutions to meet customer needs and enhance value in industrial settings.
green_innovation: TRUE. This partnership between Koch Engineered Solutions and Percepto introduces innovative AI and autonomous drone technology to monitor and reduce emissions, aligning with environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE. The collaboration between Koch Engineered Solutions and Percepto to bring AI and autonomous drone technology to industrial customers represents a new product or business process that significantly differs from previous offerings.
green_product: TRUE. The development of AI and autonomous drone technology by Koch Engineered Solutions and Percepto aligns with the definition of a green product, as it aims to reduce environmental impact through sustainable processes and energy-efficient technologies.
green_process: TRUE. The utilization of AI and autonomous drone technology by Koch Engineered Solutions and Percepto for monitoring emissions in industrial settings demonstrates the implementation of green processes to minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 541330 - Engineering Services, 541620 - Environmental Consulting Services, 541380 - Testing Laboratories, 541712 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences
greenwashing: FALSE. The article text does not exhibit greenwashing as it accurately describes the partnership between Koch Engineered Solutions and Percepto to implement AI and drone technology for reducing emissions in industrial operations.

title: ADM invests over $30m in new facility in Spain to meet growing demand for probiotics - FeedNavigator.com
summary: ADM invests over $30m in a production site to increase capacity for producing probiotics and postbiotics, aiming to tap into growing markets for health and wellness products. The facility is strategically located near an R&D center to support research on animal resilience and gut microbiome for animal health and well-being.
green_innovation: FALSE: The article describes a business innovation in health and wellness products, but it does not focus on environmental sustainability aspects.
business_innovation: TRUE: The article discusses ADM's investment in a new production site to increase its capacity for probiotics and postbiotics, representing a significant change in its business process.
green_product: FALSE: While the article talks about health and wellness products, it does not emphasize the environmental impact reduction aspects typically associated with green products.
green_process: FALSE: The article mentions research on animal resilience and microbiome, which, although related to health and sustainability, does not fit the conventional definition of a green process in terms of operational activities or manufacturing processes.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 325411 - Medicinal and Botanical Manufacturing, 325412 - Pharmaceutical Preparation Manufacturing, 541710 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences, 112990 - All Other Animal Production
greenwashing: FALSE: The article does not promote false or exaggerated environmental benefits about the product or practices discussed.

title: Krill diet fulfills choline requirements and supports better intestinal and liver health in salmon - Aquafeed.com
summary: The article evaluates the effect of choline from krill on reducing intestinal steatosis in salmon through a feeding trial conducted at the Norwegian University of Life Sciences.
green_innovation: FALSE. This article discusses a specific study on the use of choline from krill in salmon feed and does not address broader environmental sustainability goals beyond the specific research scope.
business_innovation: FALSE. The article focuses on a specific research study and its findings in salmon aquaculture, which does not align with the definition of a new or improved product or business process introduced on the market.
green_product: TRUE. The article discusses the benefits of using krill ingredients in salmon feed to reduce lipid accumulation and improve fish health, meeting the criteria of a green product by promoting environmental benefits.
green_process: TRUE. The article explores the use of choline from krill as part of dietary feed to reduce intestinal steatosis in salmon, showcasing a green process by aiming to minimize environmental impacts in aquaculture operations.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 112511 - Finfish Farming and Fish Hatcheries, 424420 - Packaged Frozen Food Merchant Wholesalers, 541710 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences, 311119 - Other Animal Food Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE. The article focuses on a specific scientific study evaluating the use of krill-based choline in salmon feed, without making any false or misleading claims about environmental benefits.

title: MSD Animal Health set to launch revamped platform to predict poultry health, prevent disease and improve performance - FeedNavigator.com
summary: MSD Animal Health introduced SenseHub Poultry, a technology that enables poultry farmers to continuously monitor and analyze health and environmental indicators of poultry flocks. The platform utilizes battery-powered sensors to track parameters like weight, water usage, humidity, light, temperature, and carbon dioxide in poultry barns, providing insights for disease detection and bird health optimization.
green_innovation: TRUE, The introduction of SenseHub Poultry by MSD Animal Health aligns with green innovation as it promotes sustainability and environmental conservation in the poultry farming industry.
business_innovation: TRUE, The adoption of SenseHub Poultry by MSD Animal Health qualifies as a business innovation, as it represents a new technology that differs significantly from their previous offerings and is being introduced to enhance animal well-being and farm outcomes.
green_product: TRUE, SenseHub Poultry is considered a green product as it is designed to reduce environmental impact by providing farmers with tools to monitor poultry health and environmental conditions efficiently, contributing to sustainable farming practices.
green_process: TRUE, The implementation of the SenseHub Poultry technology by MSD Animal Health represents a green process by minimizing environmental impact through efficient monitoring and analysis techniques in poultry farming operations.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 541940 Veterinary Services, 325412 Pharmaceutical Preparation Manufacturing, 325414 Biological Product Manufacturing, 112340 Poultry Hatcheries
greenwashing: FALSE, The article does not demonstrate greenwashing as it focuses on the genuine environmental benefits and technological advancements of SenseHub Poultry in poultry farming.
